review.comment: The first serial about the children of Bullerby belongs to my very first television experiences. I don't remember how old I was; but it was certainly before I came to school, that means before my six years of age. I was pretty fascinated by the children going barefoot through nature, I adored their boundness to nature. I feel this fascination until today, after more than thirty years. I still like all the films of Astrid Lindgren and feel the same as I felt at that time.

The first serial about the children of Bullerby belongs to my very first television experiences. I don't remember how old I was; but it was certainly before I came to school, that means before my six years of age. I was pretty fascinated by the children going barefoot through nature, I adored their boundness to nature. I feel this fascination until today, after more than thirty years. I still like all the films of Astrid Lindgren and feel the same as I felt at that time.
